post.author: Sae Whan Kim
post.content:
Thank you for your comments...
My apology for not being able to write in Korean. (for now)
We will do our best to keep it that way..
Personally I look forward to seeing your name with
lots of 'Gooodies' on Gesipan more frequently.
Cheers..
SK (A web operation member)

>코스카의홈이이렇게야하고이쁘게단정하게꾸며져기쁩니다.
>
>여자랑집은항상가꾸기에따라서달라보인다고하던데,이홈도자주업데이트하여항상이쁘고야한모습유지하길바라는맴입니다.
>
post.title: [re] 이쁜홈이다.
